name: Defend the Tower
description: Join forces with allies and defend the tower against the incoming siege in this action-packed 60 minute experience.

name: Mystery Mansion
description: Uncover the secrets of the Mystery Mansion as you search for clues and solve puzzles to escape before time runs out in this thrilling 90 minute adventure.

name: Alien Invasion
description: Battle extraterrestrial forces in a race against time to save humanity. Can you decipher the clues and find the antidote before it's too late in this 60 minute challenge?

name: Pirate's Curse
description: Set sail on a daring adventure to find the legendary treasure. Solve riddles, uncover hidden secrets and outwit your rivals in this swashbuckling 60 minute escapade.

name: The Prison Break
description: Escape from a high-security prison using cunning, intuition and your wits in this intense 90 minute adventure. Can you break free before the clock runs out?

name: The Heist
description: Assemble a team of skilled thieves and execute the perfect heist in this thrilling 60 minute challenge. Outsmart security, find the loot and make your getaway before you're caught.
